title: Akatsuki no Yona (Yona of the Dawn)
synopsis: Princess Yona lives a life of luxury and ease, completely sheltered from the problems of the seemingly peaceful Kingdom of Kouka; however, the sudden murder of the king and betrayal of her beloved cousin Su-won places Yona's life in mortal peril. Forced to escape only with Son Hak, who is both her childhood friend and bodyguard, the na√Øve princess soon discovers that Kouka is not the idyllic place she envisioned it to be. Poverty, strife, and corruption run rampant, making reclaiming the throne nothing more than a wishful fantasy given the kingdom's current state.
voices: ['Takagaki, Ayahi', 'Saitou, Chiwa', 'Kobayashi, Sanae', 'Suwabe, Junichi', 'Morita, Masakazu', 'Minagawa, Junko', 'Shimono, Hiro', 'Yamamoto, Nozomi', 'Yamamoto, Nozomi', 'Miyamoto, Mitsuru']
